name: RPG Spell Book Generator
description: Generates RPG spell books given a name

list.bookName: Small heals for noob healers (Lesser Healing)
list.description: Slightly improves the target's health regeneration for a reduced amount of time.
Changes the target's skin color to whatever the caster wishes, improving one's ability to hide or make a disguise.
Target liquid chills to about 7 degrees Celsius, works on up to five liters per casting.
Target metal becomes blisteringly hot, causing damage to anyone who touches it.

list.bookName: How to make a bug zapper that works! (Mosquito Swarm)
list.description: Summons many thousands of mosquitos and commands them to exsanguinate the target.
The target's hair becomes animated and obeys the command of the caster. The hair has tremendous strength and dexterity.

list.bookName: Don't Wait For Death: An Impatient Necromancer's Guide (Skeletal Awakening)
list.description: Animates the bones of a living target. The skeleton obeys the commands of the caster to the best of its ability.
Reverses the vision of the target, making them see as if their eyes were in the back of their head.
Causes a small explosion in the target area, causing minor damage and coating everything within 50ft in sparkling glitter.
Target's body loses all rigidity, allowing them to move as if they were made of rubber tubes.
Attempts to trap target monster in an extra-dimensional space small enough to fit inside a pocket.
The target's mouth is scrubbed clean and filled with foamy soap, causing them to choke and gag.

list.bookName: The Meaning of Prismatic Refraction (Double Rainbow)
list.description: Target source of light now projects dazzling rainbows instead of its original light.
Target now sees beautiful objects and people as hideous monstrocities and vice versa.
Intimidates all surrounding people with scary incantations and creepy effects.
Target object or person can no longer produce sound.
Curses target to be more likely to fail the more often they attempt a given action.
Target door or container cannot be opened by mundane means.
All nearby people consider target to be at fault for your next action.
Caster self-immolates and dies in a conflagration. Caster returns to full health thirty minutes later.
Magically pulls the target's underwear up so far it makes it difficult for them to walk.
Explosively shatters all fragile objects and surfaces in the target area.
